olac-archive.location: 3615 Market Street, Suite 200, Philadelphia, PA 19104-2608, USA
olac-archive.synopsis: The Linguistic Data Consortium is an open consortium of universities, companies and government research laboratories. It creates, collects and distributes speech and text databases, lexicons, and other resources for research and development purposes. The University of Pennsylvania is the LDC's host institution.
olac-archive.access: LDC publications may be purchased from the LDC; for full details see [http://www.ldc.upenn.edu/Obtaining/]. Some publications are only available to LDC members, and some require the signing of a license agreement.
